About.meta_description: Learn about AI Free Pool - your community-driven platform for discovering free AI credits and trials
About.title: About AI Free Pool
About.intro: AI Free Pool is a community-driven platform that helps you discover and track free AI credits, trials, and promotions from top AI platforms. Our mission is to make AI tools more accessible by aggregating the latest free credit campaigns in one place.
About.offer_1: Curated list of AI free credit campaigns
About.offer_4: Bookmark and track your favorite campaigns
About.step_1: Browse campaigns from various AI platforms
About.step_2: Filter by category, platform, or credit amount
About.community_text: Follow us on social media to stay updated with the latest AI free credit campaigns and never miss an opportunity to try new AI tools for free.

Guide.meta_title: Complete Guide to Free AI API Credits in 2026
Guide.meta_description: Discover all free AI API credits available in 2026. Compare platforms, models, and free tiers from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and more.
Guide.title: Complete Guide to Free AI API Credits in 2026
Guide.subtitle: All the free AI credits and trials you can get right now, updated regularly.
Guide.faq_q1: How do I get free AI API credits?
Guide.faq_a1: Most AI platforms offer free tiers or trial credits for new users. Simply sign up on the platform's website and you'll typically receive free credits automatically. Some platforms require credit card verification while others don't.
Guide.faq_a2: Yes, most free AI credits have an expiration date. The validity period varies by platform — some offer credits valid for 30 days, while others provide credits that last up to a year. Check each platform's terms for specific details.
Guide.faq_q3: Can I use free credits for commercial projects?
Guide.faq_a3: In most cases, yes. Free tier credits generally come with the same API terms of service as paid credits. However, free tiers may have rate limits or usage restrictions. Always review the platform's terms of service for commercial use policies.
Guide.faq_q4: Which AI platform offers the most free credits?
Guide.faq_a4: The amount of free credits varies and changes frequently. Visit our platform pages for the most up-to-date comparison of free credit offerings across all major AI platforms.

PlatformGuide_chatgpt.meta_title: ChatGPT Free Tier Guide 2026 – Free Limits, Pricing & Tips
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.meta_description: Complete guide to ChatGPT free tier in 2026. Learn about free usage limits, GPT-4o access, paid plan comparison, and tips to maximize your free quota.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.keywords: ChatGPT free,ChatGPT free tier,GPT-4o free,OpenAI free,ChatGPT pricing 2026,ChatGPT Plus,ChatGPT Pro
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.title: ChatGPT Free Tier Complete Guide
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using ChatGPT for free in 2026, including limits, models, and how to get the most out of your free quota.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.intro_p1: ChatGPT is OpenAI's flagship conversational AI product, launched in November 2022. It has quickly become the world's most popular AI chatbot with over 200 million weekly active users. ChatGPT can help with writing, coding, analysis, math, creative tasks, and much more.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.intro_p2: OpenAI offers a generous free tier that gives everyone access to GPT-4o mini and limited GPT-4o usage. The free plan is perfect for casual users who want to experience cutting-edge AI without any cost.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.feature_1_desc: Free users get limited access to GPT-4o, OpenAI's most capable model
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.feature_2_desc: Supports text, image input, and file uploads even on free tier
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.feature_3_desc: Access thousands of custom GPTs built by the community
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.free_tier_intro: ChatGPT's free tier provides substantial functionality. Here's exactly what you get:
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.free_row_2_value: GPT-4o (limited messages per day, varies by demand)
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.free_row_3_value: Web browsing, file uploads, image input, GPT Store access, basic data analysis
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.free_row_4_value: No image generation (DALL·E), no advanced voice mode, lower rate limits during peak hours
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.free_tier_note: Note: Free tier limits may vary based on server demand. OpenAI adjusts quotas dynamically.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.plan_pro_feature_2: o1 pro mode for complex tasks
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.pricing_note: Prices as of February 2026. OpenAI also offers Team ($25/user/mo) and Enterprise plans.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.tips_title: Tips to Maximize Your Free Quota
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.tip_1_title: Use GPT-4o mini for routine tasks
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.tip_1_desc: GPT-4o mini is fast and capable for most everyday tasks. Save your limited GPT-4o messages for complex reasoning or creative work.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.tip_2_desc: Clear, detailed prompts get better results in fewer messages, helping you stay within your daily limits.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.tip_3_desc: Custom GPTs from the GPT Store come with pre-configured prompts and knowledge, saving you messages on setup.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.tip_4_desc: New OpenAI API accounts get free credits. If you're a developer, the API can be more cost-effective than a Plus subscription.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.comp_row_2_free: Claude 3.5 Sonnet with daily message limit
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.comparison_note: Free tier offerings change frequently. Visit each platform's page on AI Free Pool for the latest details.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.faq_q1: Is ChatGPT really free to use?
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.faq_a1: Yes, ChatGPT offers a free tier with access to GPT-4o mini (unlimited) and limited GPT-4o messages. No credit card is required to sign up. The free tier includes web browsing, file uploads, and GPT Store access.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.faq_q2: How many free messages do I get per day on ChatGPT?
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.faq_a2: GPT-4o mini messages are essentially unlimited within rate limits. GPT-4o messages on the free tier are limited and vary based on demand — typically around 10-16 messages per day. OpenAI adjusts this dynamically.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.faq_q3: Is ChatGPT Plus worth it over the free tier?
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.faq_a3: If you use ChatGPT daily for work or creative projects, Plus is worth it for 5x more GPT-4o messages, DALL·E image generation, and advanced voice mode. For casual use, the free tier is sufficient.
PlatformGuide_chatgpt.cta_desc: Sign up in seconds — no credit card required. Get instant access to GPT-4o mini and limited GPT-4o.

PlatformGuide_claude.meta_title: Claude Free Tier Guide 2026 – Free Limits, Pricing & Tips
PlatformGuide_claude.meta_description: Complete guide to Claude free tier in 2026. Learn about free usage limits, Claude 3.5 Sonnet access, paid plan comparison, and tips to maximize your free quota.
PlatformGuide_claude.keywords: Claude free,Claude free tier,Anthropic free,Claude 3.5 Sonnet free,Claude pricing 2026,Claude Pro,Claude API
PlatformGuide_claude.title: Claude Free Tier Complete Guide
PlatformGuide_claude.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Claude for free in 2026, including limits, models, and how to get the most out of your free quota.
PlatformGuide_claude.intro_p1: Claude is Anthropic's conversational AI assistant, known for its strong reasoning capabilities, safety-first design, and exceptional performance on long-form content. Claude excels at analysis, writing, coding, and handling documents up to 200K tokens.
PlatformGuide_claude.intro_p2: Anthropic offers a free tier on claude.ai that gives everyone access to Claude 3.5 Sonnet with daily message limits. It's ideal for users who value thoughtful, nuanced AI responses.
PlatformGuide_claude.feature_1_desc: Industry-leading context window for processing long documents and codebases
PlatformGuide_claude.feature_2_desc: Constitutional AI approach ensures helpful, harmless, and honest responses
PlatformGuide_claude.feature_3_desc: Create and iterate on documents, code, and visualizations in a side panel
PlatformGuide_claude.free_tier_intro: Claude's free tier on claude.ai provides access to powerful models. Here's what you get:
PlatformGuide_claude.free_row_2_value: 200K tokens — upload long PDFs, codebases, and documents
PlatformGuide_claude.free_row_3_value: Artifacts, file uploads, image input, Projects (limited), web search
PlatformGuide_claude.free_row_4_value: Daily message cap (resets each day), no Claude 3 Opus, lower priority during peak hours
PlatformGuide_claude.free_tier_note: Note: Daily message limits vary based on demand. Anthropic adjusts quotas dynamically.
PlatformGuide_claude.pricing_note: Prices as of February 2026. Anthropic also offers Enterprise plans with custom pricing.
PlatformGuide_claude.tips_title: Tips to Maximize Your Free Quota
PlatformGuide_claude.tip_1_desc: Claude's 200K context window shines with file uploads. Upload PDFs and let Claude analyze them in one message instead of multiple.
PlatformGuide_claude.tip_2_desc: Projects let you set persistent instructions and upload reference files, so you don't waste messages re-explaining context.
PlatformGuide_claude.tip_3_title: Be thorough in your first message
PlatformGuide_claude.tip_3_desc: Claude excels at long, detailed responses. Give it all the context upfront to get comprehensive answers in fewer turns.
PlatformGuide_claude.tip_4_desc: New Anthropic API accounts receive free credits. The API offers more granular control and can be more cost-effective for developers.
PlatformGuide_claude.comp_row_1_free: Claude 3.5 Sonnet with daily message limit
PlatformGuide_claude.comparison_note: Free tier offerings change frequently. Visit each platform's page on AI Free Pool for the latest details.
PlatformGuide_claude.faq_a1: Yes, Claude offers a free tier on claude.ai with access to Claude 3.5 Sonnet. You get a daily message limit that resets each day. No credit card required.
PlatformGuide_claude.faq_a2: Claude supports up to 200K tokens of context — that's roughly 150,000 words or a 500-page book. This applies to both free and paid tiers.
PlatformGuide_claude.faq_a3: If you rely on Claude for daily work, Pro gives you 5x more messages, access to Claude 3 Opus, and priority during peak hours. For occasional use, the free tier works well.
PlatformGuide_claude.cta_desc: Sign up at claude.ai — no credit card required. Get instant access to Claude 3.5 Sonnet with 200K context.

PlatformGuide_gemini.meta_title: Gemini Free Tier Guide 2026 – Free Limits, Pricing & Tips
PlatformGuide_gemini.meta_description: Complete guide to Google Gemini free tier in 2026. Learn about free usage limits, Gemini 2.0 Flash access, paid plan comparison, and tips to maximize your free quota.
PlatformGuide_gemini.keywords: Gemini free,Google Gemini free tier,Gemini 2.0 Flash free,Google AI free,Gemini pricing 2026,Gemini Advanced,Google AI Studio
PlatformGuide_gemini.title: Gemini Free Tier Complete Guide
PlatformGuide_gemini.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Google Gemini for free in 2026, including limits, models, and how to get the most out of your free quota.
PlatformGuide_gemini.intro_p1: Gemini is Google's flagship AI platform, deeply integrated with the Google ecosystem including Search, Gmail, Docs, and more. Gemini 2.0 represents Google's most capable AI models, offering strong multimodal capabilities across text, images, audio, and video.
PlatformGuide_gemini.intro_p2: Google offers a generous free tier through gemini.google.com and Google AI Studio. Free users get unlimited access to Gemini 2.0 Flash and limited access to Gemini 2.0 Pro, making it one of the most accessible AI platforms available.
PlatformGuide_gemini.feature_1_desc: Works seamlessly with Gmail, Docs, Drive, and other Google services
PlatformGuide_gemini.feature_2_desc: Natively understands text, images, audio, video, and code
PlatformGuide_gemini.feature_3_desc: Gemini Pro offers up to 1 million token context window
PlatformGuide_gemini.free_tier_intro: Google offers generous free access to Gemini. Here's what you get:
PlatformGuide_gemini.free_row_3_value: Web search, image generation, file uploads, Google Workspace integration, code execution
PlatformGuide_gemini.free_row_4_value: No Gemini Advanced features, limited Pro model access, lower priority during peak hours
PlatformGuide_gemini.free_tier_note: Note: Google also offers free API access through Google AI Studio with generous rate limits for Gemini 2.0 Flash.
PlatformGuide_gemini.pricing_note: Prices as of February 2026. Gemini Advanced is included with Google One AI Premium plan.
PlatformGuide_gemini.tips_title: Tips to Maximize Your Free Quota
PlatformGuide_gemini.tip_1_title: Use Gemini 2.0 Flash for most tasks
PlatformGuide_gemini.tip_1_desc: Flash is fast and capable for everyday tasks. Save your limited Pro messages for complex reasoning or research.
PlatformGuide_gemini.tip_2_desc: Gemini works natively with Gmail, Docs, and Drive. Use @mentions in Google Workspace to get AI help without leaving your workflow.
PlatformGuide_gemini.tip_3_desc: Google AI Studio offers free API access with generous rate limits. Great for developers who want to build with Gemini.
PlatformGuide_gemini.tip_4_desc: Gemini excels at understanding images, audio, and video. Upload media files to get more value from each conversation turn.
PlatformGuide_gemini.comp_row_3_free: Claude 3.5 Sonnet with daily message limit
PlatformGuide_gemini.comparison_note: Free tier offerings change frequently. Visit each platform's page on AI Free Pool for the latest details.
PlatformGuide_gemini.faq_a1: Yes, Google offers a free tier with unlimited Gemini 2.0 Flash and limited Gemini 2.0 Pro access. No credit card required. Google AI Studio also provides free API access.
PlatformGuide_gemini.faq_a2: Gemini 2.0 Flash supports up to 1 million tokens of context. Gemini 2.0 Pro also supports 1M tokens with Gemini Advanced. This is the largest context window among major AI platforms.
PlatformGuide_gemini.faq_a3: If you're already in the Google ecosystem, Gemini Advanced at $19.99/mo is great value — it includes Google One AI Premium (2TB storage) plus full Gemini 2.0 Pro access with 1M context.
PlatformGuide_gemini.cta_desc: Visit gemini.google.com — no credit card required. Get instant access to Gemini 2.0 Flash with multimodal capabilities.
